name: Madonna and Child with a Male Saint, Catherine of Alexandria and a Donor
description: Madonna and Child with a Male Saint, Catherine of Alexandria and a Donor; Michelangelo di Pietro Membrini (Italian (Lucchese), active about 1489 - about 1521); about 1500; Tempera on panel; 101.6 × 101.6 cm (40 × 40 in.); 68.PB.4; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Madonna and Child with a Male Saint, Catherine of Alexandria and a Donor
